unalcol.random.integer

Class IntRoulette

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.random.Random<java.lang.Integer>
      • unalcol.random.integer.RandInt
        • unalcol.random.integer.IntRoulette

  • public class IntRoulette
extends RandInt

    Generates integer numbers following a Weighted probability density (Roulette)

    Source code is available.
